Room.Name: West Grounds
Room.ShortDescription: These are the well kept west grounds of the Ogden Villa Estate.
Room.LongDescription: The lush green grass is almost carpet-like in appearance, with every blade trimmed to the exact same length. South of you is a high wall surrounding a garden. A gate allows you a glimpse inside, and you see it radiates a soft glow, hinting there is more to the garden than just nature.
